Trade/Device Name(s): CareSens S Fit Blood Glucose Monitoring System
CareSens S Blood Glucose Test Strips
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): CareSens S Fit Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for CareSens S Fit Blood Glucose Monitoring System utilizing electrochemical biosensor technology for self-monitoring glucose in capillary whole blood.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from the fingertip for self-testing at home by people with diabetes to monitor effectiveness of diabetes control; not for neonates, diagnosis, or screening of diabetes.
